Speaker A: Hello? Hello, sorry, yes, speaking. Yeah, yeah, yeah. Hi, this is from Amber, student. How are you? Yeah, actually I got an inquiry regarding your accommodation in London.
Speaker B: Like you have this property called chapter is LinkedIn.
Speaker C: Yes, yes.
Speaker A: Yeah. You have filled the form for this ensuite silver mid level which is for a 51 week and the rent is 377 pound per week for from 13th of September till 5th of September 2026. So should I start the booking process for this property?
Speaker C: Yes, that's correct.
Speaker B: All right, could you please also confirm.
Speaker A: Me which payment plan would you like to take? Whether it's a for one installment, two installment or a fourth install like four installment.
Speaker C: Sorry, because I also have a question. So basically is it through Amber, is it that I pay them or do I pay Amber?
Speaker A: No, no, no. You do not supposed to pay anything to Amber. I can see that you have paid the holding fee of 2025. So don't worry about that. It's a refundable token amount.
Speaker B: So anyway, after your booking will gonna refund this amount.
Speaker A: And you do not supposed to pay.
Speaker B: Any single amount to Amber.
Speaker A: You can directly pay to the chapter instructor team. Once we register yourself on the portal.
Speaker B: You can, I can share with you the login credential.
Speaker A: You can simply login in the portal and accept the contract and make the payment over there.
Speaker C: Okay, so I just go straight to the chapter page?
Speaker A: No, no, you do not supposed to go there. We have already initiated the booking process shortly in the next half an hour I'm just gonna share with you. Then you can login with that ID.
Speaker B: And you can make the payment, accept.
Speaker A: The contract over there.
Speaker B: Okay.
Speaker C: And I have a question. Will I be able to choose my room?
Speaker A: Do you have any specific preferences regarding that?
Speaker C: So I am a post grad. I don't know if that's possible to like kind of check whether there will be a lot of undergrads. But yeah, I was just looking maybe also for a room that is not close to the kitchen.
Speaker A: Close to the kitchen? You want room with.
Speaker C: That is not.
Speaker A: That is not. Okay. Okay.
Speaker B: Yeah.
Speaker A: Okay, so what I'll do while initiating the booking process, I can add this.
Speaker B: In the additional comment and as a.
Speaker A: Special request from your end. And I can also drop an email to the property to not allocate your room like next to the kitchen. It's a mix of postgraduate and undergraduate.
Speaker C: I'm a postgraduate and I know that, I mean I know that maybe there won't be an option, but yeah, I just wanted to like let you know.
Speaker A: Yeah, that's correct.
Speaker B: Like usually it doesn't come up with.
Speaker A: Like to select what's the pro schedule. But still I can definitely make a request for you to allocate your room with postgraduate students only and not next to the kitchen and yeah, and next you via WhatsApp as well.
Speaker B: Okay.
Speaker C: Okay.
Speaker A: Yeah. Could you also please confirm your payment plan? Would you like to take a two installment or four installment or a single installment?
Speaker C: I think for installment. So I just pay in four in like four times. Right?
Speaker A: Okay.
Speaker B: So if you'll go for a four.
Speaker A: Installment there is slightly changes in your total rent like 2% extra.
Speaker B: So this 377 pound. Yeah, 377 pound will becomes like 5.
Speaker A: To 7 pound extra.
Speaker B: Weekly rent becomes 385.
Speaker C: Okay. And if I was supposed to pay.
Speaker A: In two installments, there will be no changes. It will be the three install same rent. Like okay. 377 only. Okay.
Speaker C: And this is going to be in three installment.
Speaker A: There is no three installment available.
Speaker B: One.
Speaker A: Okay. Two and four. So if you'll go for a one installment you will get a 2% discount on your total rent. If you go for a two installment there will be no changes in the rent.
Speaker B: It's the same 377 pound per week.
Speaker A: And if you'll go for a four installment there will be slightly change like 2% extra. The premium charges for the four installment and the rent becomes 385. Okay.
Speaker C: So I think I will go for the two installment.
Speaker B: All right.
Speaker A: I'm just proceeding ahead with the two installment. I'll keep you updated over on a WhatsApp.
Speaker C: Okay. Okay. Thank you very much.
Speaker B: Most welcome.
Speaker A: Thank you. Thank you.
